name: SimFab DD Modular Racing Sim Cockpit
description:
Introducing the SimFab DD Sim Racing Modular Cockpit

Exceptional Design for Direct Drive Wheel Bases

The DD Cockpit features a cutting-edge racing wheel crossbar mounting design that’s specifically engineered to accommodate all heavy direct drive wheel bases with grace and precision.

It has been rigorously tested with direct drive wheel bases boasting a whopping 20NM+ of force feedback (FFB), ensuring uncompromised performance under even the most demanding conditions.

*Gear shift mount not included and offered as an optional kit.

A Chassis that Handles it All



The SimFab DD Cockpit is the ultimate companion for your direct drive wheel and hydraulic pedals.

It’s not bound by brand limitations – this cockpit is seamlessly compatible and a direct fit for all recognized brands, including Logitech DD Pro, Fanatec CSL Pro, Fanatec Podium 1 and 2, Simagic, Moza wheels, and pedals, and more.

Unparalleled Adjustability



What truly sets the DD Framework apart is its unmatched adjustment capabilities. No matter your size or preference, this cockpit is tailor-made for every sim racing enthusiast. Plus, it’s multi-user friendly, so you can share the thrill with friends and family.

With a simple turn of a knob, you can effortlessly customize the controls to match your unique preferences.

Strength in Steel



Our tubular steel framework offers three times the tensile strength of equivalent extruded aluminum, ensuring a rock-solid structure that maintains a clean and tidy appearance.

The telescoping feature allows for quick re-adjustment and hot swaps between proprietary brackets and controls, so you’re always in control of your setup.

Beyond Racing: Transition to Flight Sim Setup



But the SimFab DD Cockpit isn’t limited to just racing. Effortlessly transition to a flight sim setup with ease.

Join us in embracing the future of racing and flight simulation with the SimFab DD Sim Racing Modular Cockpit. Elevate your game, and experience the next level of realism today.

Conversion Kits

SimFab DD Conversion Kit

For those upgrading from the Gen3 cockpit chassis, explore our “DD Conversion Kit” to enjoy all the upgraded parts.

Introducing the SimFab GEN3 Racing Cockpit

Exceptional Design for Optimum Immersion & Comfort

Designed as a modular and versatile ecosystem complimented by various add-on accessories for optimum immersion, comfort and an overall enjoyable experience by young, adult and senior members of the household. Compact, easy to move and easy to store away.

*Electronic controls and add-on optional accessories sold separately.

Compatibility



Choosing the SimFab simulation ecosystem ensures flexible and up-to-date compatibility not only with popular brands controls such as Logitech, Thrustmaster and Fanatec but also with specific high-end brands like VirPil, VKB, WinWing, Honeycomb and more.

Compatible with all racing wheels and pedals such as Logitech G923, G29, G920, Thrustmaster and Fanatec.

Compatible with all gaming platforms: PS5, PS4, PC, Xbox One, Xbox X.

Compatible with all sim racing and flight sim controls brands: Logitech, Thrustmaster, Fanatec, Generic USB handbrake, Buttkicker, Aurasound, Saitek, CH Products, VKB sim, VirPil, WingWin, Slaw, MFG, Hori, VirtualReality, Oculus.

10+  years
We chose PU fabric because it’s far superior to the commonly used PU artificial leather. PU leatherette material lasts up to two years on average before it starts disintegrating but PU fabric lasts 10+ years. It is also more breathable than PU leather, which tends to sweat.

Maximum comfort 
SimFab full-size racing seats are made of steel tubular inner frame and thick cold-cured foam, providing maximum comfort for long hours of gaming. The cockpit can be converted for general lounging or console gaming use.

The seat is offered in six vibrant colors of choices: black, red, blue, orange, green and yellow.

name: SimFab DCS Flight Sim Modular Cockpit
description:
Introducing SimFab's DCS Edition Modular Combat Sim Cockpit

Elevate Your Sim Experience



At SimFab, we are dedicated to not only enhancing your immersion but also ensuring your comfort during extended simming sessions. Our patented design features a seat with a slanted, fully functional seat base cutout, allowing for motion-free use of your fighter stick, even with grip extensions.

This setup places your controls at the perfect arm’s reach, whether you’re using a standard grip or an extended stick as a helicopter cyclic.

The seat is generously padded with foam to guarantee the comfort you desire for those long missions.

Versatile Adaptability



While our DCS cockpit excels in the realm of DCS World simulation, it is not limited to it. Optional add-on plates and brackets are available to convert your setup into a civil/commercial aviation cockpit or a space sim ship.

For those who seek even greater versatility in the simulation world, we offer the option to easily convert it into a sim racing cockpit, with dedicated conversion kits readily available.

FAQs

What is in the package?

https://simfab.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/simfab-dcs-edition-modular-flight-pit-parts.webp

Essential Package Includes:


Flight seat with functional cutout for maximum comfort and maneuverability.
7″ seat risers providing 5 degrees seat slope for ergonomic seating position.
Seat frame for structural durability and stability.
Rudder pedal plate (type F) for precise yaw and taxi braking control over your aircraft. Refer to Configuration#4 (rudder pedal plate assembly as stand-alone product) for detailed controls compatibility.
Side-by-side stick (plates set type C) and throttle (plate type B) HOTAS-style mount brackets with adapter plates type B, throttle side and type C, stick side. Refer to configuration #2 (side by side kit as stand-alone product) for detailed controls compatibility.
Centered stick lower mount bracket with an extra set of stick plates (type C). Refer to configuration #6 (centered stick lower mount bracket as stand-alone product) for detailed controls compatibility.
All necessary controls mounting hardware, including a required wrench set.
Default adapter plates assume compatible controls as common choice for DCS edition cockpit, however exchange of plates is available at no additional cost. Refer to alternative plates for other brands/models sticks and throttles such as: plate type A, type D, type J. To exchange default adapter plates, please add a note in "custom notes" field, within ordering steps.
Available is also custom fabricated adapter plate to customers specifications. Reach out to us for further details.

We understand the importance of compatibility, which is why our DCS Edition cockpit is meticulously crafted to ensure 100% compatibility with popular control brands. Each control has been physically tested, guaranteeing a seamless fit within our modular framework, with precise ergonomic placement and swift control swap-out capabilities.

short_description:
Overview

Universal tactile shaker bracket designed for most shakers / Low Frequency Transducers (LFTs).
Can be mounted on either side of the cockpit frame or seat using an available slot/opening.
Robust, corrosion-resistant construction: mild steel with zinc plating and a sand?blasted finish.

Key features

Universal fit for clamp-on and bolted shakers.
Mounts left or right of the seat; dual-bracket installation supported for both sides or rear mounting.
Compatible with cockpits that use the EZ rolling?wheel mounting location?dual brackets can be installed at the seat?back where those wheels are normally mounted.
New revision adds holes for silicon?rubber wheels so dual brackets can serve a dual purpose (hold transducers and support rolling wheels). Wheel option is available only with a dual?shaker setup.
Includes assorted mounting hardware for straightforward installation.

Installation notes & compatibility

Clamp?on shakers (example: ButtKicker Gamer2 or Advance) clamp directly to the bracket?s vertical arm. Do not over?tighten the shaker?s factory clamping bolt?tighten only to the shaker manufacturer?s recommended snugness to avoid damage.
Bolted shakers: secure using two bolts placed diagonally through the bracket slots.
Mounting position affects feel: mounting the shaker farther from the frame increases overall vibration translation into the cockpit; mounting closer produces a tighter, more localized response. Adjust position to tune feedback to your preference.
If all available frame slots are already occupied, an optional?4?way coupling?is required for additional mounting points.

What?s included

Universal shaker bracket (mild steel, zinc plated, sand?blasted)
Assorted mounting hardware (bolts, washers, nuts, spacers)
Instructions for clamp-on and bolted installations

Safety & care

Do not overtighten factory clamping bolts or fasteners?this may damage the shaker or bracket.
Regularly check hardware for tightness and corrosion. The zinc plating provides protection, but periodic inspection is recommended in high?humidity environments.

Compatible brands shakers and low frequency transducers:

All?Buttkicker,?Dayton Audio,?Aurasound?and others.

name: Racing and Flight Sim Seat (Removable Foam)
description:
Discover the ultimate in-flight simulation experience

Cutting-edge full-size flight simulator seat

Our flight sim seats are specially designed and equipped with a variety of features to enhance and provide a realistic and immersive flying experience. They are crafted to replicate the cockpit of an aircraft and are used by professional pilots, flight training centers, and flight simulation enthusiasts. Our seats are a key component in creating an authentic and engaging flight simulation experience.
When not using the center stick, the removable foam insert is secured back in place by an industrial-strength oversized hook and loop patch, returning the seat base to its default setting.

Reclining Mechanism



Immerse yourself in the virtual skies with a seamlessly adjustable reclining mechanism. Achieve the perfect angle to suit your flight simulation needs.



Sliders



Tailor your seat's position to your exact specifications with precision sliders, ensuring a snug and personalized fit.

Functional Seat Base Cutout



Our innovative seat design includes a strategically engineered cutout, providing the freedom for full stick motion with grip extension or cyclic, without any intrusion into the seat foam. Maintain a natural, ergonomic reach for uninterrupted flight precision.



Removable Foam Insert



Easily customize your seat's cushioning with a removable foam insert. Experience unparalleled support and comfort, personalized to your liking.

PU fabric lasts 10+ years



We chose PU fabric because it’s far superior to the commonly used PU artificial leather. PU leatherette material lasts up to two years on average before it starts disintegrating but PU fabric lasts 10+ years. It is also more breathable than PU leather, which tends to sweat.

Maximum comfort



SimFab full-size racing seats are made of steel tubular inner frame, thick cold-cured foam and breathable fabric upholstery, providing maximum comfort for long hours of gaming.

The seat is offered in six vibrant colors of choices: black, red, blue, orange, green and yellow.

At SimFab, we prioritize quality, functionality, and comfort above all else. Elevate your flight simulation experience to new heights with a seat that's engineered for excellence.

Flight Sim #14 Extended Upper L Bracket - variation description

Left and right horizontal consoles fit up to 4 controls on each side of cockpit seat.

There are total of four universal adapter plates compatible for horizontal mount. Each plate is predrilled to accept various group of controls as illustrated and listed.

Purchasing optional extended upper L bracket assumes an already existing SimFab cockpit with one adapter plate on either side, part of default base package.

First level variation includes upper extended bracket with choice of adapter plate.

Second level of variation adds additional adapter plate. To purchase more than one upper L bracket, repeat ordering process.

All adapter plates include complete assortment of controls mounting hardware as per compatibility list.

Extended upper L bracket kit includes set of small female knobs with molded M6 nuts as an optional substitute of standard nuts. Quick release knobs allow plates “hot-swapping” without need of 10mm wrench which is never to be found in tool box. name: SimFab DCS Flight Sim Modular Cockpit with Pimax Crystal Sim Limited Edition VR Headset
description:
Immersive Comfort



At SimFab, we are dedicated to not only enhancing your immersion but also ensuring your comfort during extended simming sessions. Our patented design features a seat with a slanted, fully functional seat base cutout, allowing for motion-free use of your fighter stick, even with grip extensions.

This setup places your controls at the perfect arm’s reach, whether you’re using a standard grip or an extended stick as a helicopter cyclic. The seat is generously padded with foam to guarantee the comfort you desire for those long missions.

Versatile Adaptability



While our DCS cockpit excels in the realm of DCS World simulation, it is not limited to it. Optional add-on plates and brackets are available to convert your setup into a civil/commercial aviation cockpit or a space sim ship.

For those who seek even greater versatility in the simulation world, we offer the option to easily convert it into a sim racing cockpit, with dedicated conversion kits readily available.

FAQs

What is in the package?

https://simfab.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/800x-parts-DCS-composition-for-site-122322-2.jpg

DCS Essential Package Includes:


Flight seat with functional cutout for maximum comfort and maneuverability.
7″ seat risers for ergonomic seating position.
Seat frame for structural durability and stability.
Rudder pedal plate for precise control over your aircraft.
Side-by-side stick and throttle HOTAS-style mount brackets with adapter plates.
Centered stick lower mount bracket with an extra set of stick plates.

description:
DISCLAIMER: Trainer Station Cockpit is not BATD or AATD rated device and intended only for pre-FAA or post-FAA certification practice simulation device.

Introducing SimFab's

Trainer Station Cockpit

Elevate your flight simulation experience with the SimFab Trainer Station, meticulously crafted to mirror the authentic controls and ergonomics of popular aircraft models.

Designed for both home enthusiasts and professional flight schools, our modular cockpit offers unparalleled realism at an affordable price point.

Trainer Station Cockpit Base Package

Base Package consists of: Seat, Seat frame, Rudder Pedal Plate, Yoke Adapter Plate, Throttle Control Adapter Plate, Wing Flap Control. Under Yoke: electrical switches, ignition - starter switch, parking brake handle.

Seat risers with total fixed seat height from floor to top of seat base approximately 17 inches.
*Seat foam will compress slightly upon being seated.

Alternative controls and switches brackets are available upon request.

Glass Cockpit Avionics Panel Add-On

Cessna 172/182 Center Panel Add-On

Designed to Foster Skill Development



Whether you're a budding pilot honing your muscle memory or a seasoned aviator refining your emergency procedures, the SimFab Trainer Station is your trusted companion.

Its modular design allows for easy customization, catering to the needs of candidates preparing for FAA certification and current pilots seeking to sharpen their skills.

Unrivaled Compatibility



Compatible with a wide range of flight simulation controls, from premium offerings like Virtual Fly and Red Bird to entry-level options such as Honeycomb and Logitech–Saitek, our trainer station ensures seamless integration with your preferred setup.

Tailored to Your Preferences



The base cockpit framework comes complete with essential components such as a comfortable seat, rudder pedal plate, yoke adapter plate, and throttle control adapter plate.

For added realism, our center console replicates the layout of popular training aircraft like the Cessna172/182, while customizable options are available upon request.

Personalized Avionics Panels



Our avionics panel is pre-configured for compatibility with the Garmin G1000 navigation system, offering a seamless transition for pilots familiar with glass cockpit technology.

Customization options include touchscreen displays, steam gauges, or a hybrid combination to suit your training needs.

Built to Last



Crafted from premium materials including extruded aluminum profiles and steel tubular frames, our cockpit guarantees durability and longevity.

Adapter plates, precision-cut using CNC technology, ensure a snug fit for all compatible controls straight out of the box.

Experience the Future of Flight Simulation



With the SimFab Modular Flight Simulation Trainer Edition Cockpit, embark on a journey of immersive training and unparalleled realism.

Whether you're chasing your dream of flight or striving for excellence in your aviation career, our cockpit is your ultimate tool for success.

name: Retrofit Mounting Bracket Kit for Force-feedback And Control Loaded Flight Sticks, Moza AB9, VPforce Rhino
description:
Retrofit kit is meant for Moza AB9 Force Feedback stick base. Kit can be used for center mount or side mount.

Offer has variation with parts for center mount only and added parts for side mount. Center mount kit is required to use the side mount.

Center mounted, stick base may require adjustable grip extension to bring grip to proper height level where pilot right hand side can rest on right leg while operating the stick comfortably.

Included in the center mount kit are dual 4mm plates, totaling 8mm of base plate. Plates are clamped against SimFab frame center tube with fixed height setting. Grip height can only be adjusted via grip extension. We recommend our adjustable grip extension, configuration #7 with continious adjustment between 70mm and 195mm.

Included in the side mount kit are shorten lower mount bracket and additional bottom plate. Bottom plate in center and side are stationary, while top plate (attached to Moza base) is interchangeable with stick base being mounted to it.

Side mount kit requires the top L bracket from our center stick lower mount bracket kit, configuration #6 which is included in our DCS edition cockpit as well as Rotor-craft edition cockpit.

Collective Bracket: Securely holds your collective controls, enhancing your immersive flying experience.

Detailed Assembly Manuals: Color-coded booklets for each modular component guide you through the setup process.

Complete Controls Hardware Package: This includes all necessary mounting hardware and a full set of real chromed wrenches, making assembly simple—no trips to Home Depot required!

Unmatched Compatibility

Komodo Collective Base: Designed for precision and reliability.

Modular Design for Maximum Flexibility

Like all our cockpits, the Rotorcraft Flight Sim Modular Cockpit is fully modular. Easily switch to fixed-wing brackets for yoke or throttle quadrant setups, or side-by-side brackets for combat and space simulations. Transformation between setups takes mere seconds!

Exceptional Comfort

Experience the 15-year legacy of our full-size, foam-filled ergonomic seat, complete with springs that guarantee hours of comfortable simming and full immersion in your flight adventures.

Experience the thrill of rotor wing flight with our dedicated helicopter base cockpit designed for passionate simmers and professional pilots alike. Crafted for exceptional comfort, realism, and compatibility, the SimFab Rotorcraft Edition transforms your simulation setup into an unparalleled aerial adventure.



Multiple Variants for Different Flight Experiences
Our Rotorcraft Cockpit is available in several customized configurations to suit your preferred controls and aircraft types:



1. Virpil Controls-Based Cockpit
For the most authentic and precise helicopter simulation, we highly recommend using Virpil Controls products. Virpil?s control systems are engineered to closely replicate real aircraft control motions, offering an immersive experience with advanced adjustability:

Virpil Stick Base: Features a sophisticated design allowing friction adjustments, removal of stick return springs for a true cyclic feel, proper motion throw with added grip extension and interchangeable cams for fine-tuning cyclic control.
Virpil Collective Control: Available with various grip options, crafted with exceptional quality. Pair with the Virpil collective base to match your helicopter, whether for combat modules like DCS World (e.g., AH-64 Apache, UH-1H Huey, Ka-50 Black Shark) or civilian helicopter sims via Microsoft Flight Simulator (MSFS), X-Plane, and others.
Compatibility: The Virpil control frame supports WinWing Collective, Komodo collective, and sticks like Thrustmaster AVA, WinWing Orion 2, and VKB Gunfighter with grip extensions.
Modular Ecosystem: Our control frame is part of a flexible ecosystem that allows adding additional controls and adapting for various flight simulations, including General Aviation (Cessna style and alike), Commercial Aircraft (Boeing, Airbus), Combat Fighters (F/A-18, F-16), Space Sim (Star Citizen, Elite Dangerous), and even Sim Racing setups.




2. Max Flight Stick-Based Framework
For enthusiasts focusing on helicopter simulation, Max Flight offers highly accurate and dedicated control solutions:

Popular Modules: Designed for aircraft such as Bell 206, Robinson R22/R44, UH-1H Huey, and Airbus H145.
Design Specificity: The Max Flight Stick framework is custom-made for Max?s controls, delivering precise and authentic helicopter handling. Please note, this framework is not part of our modular ecosystem but can be customized with attachments upon request.




Elevate Your Flight Simulation Experience
Whether you're a combat pilot, a civilian helicopter enthusiast, or a space explorer, our SimFab Rotorcraft Cockpit offers the flexibility, quality, and realism to elevate your simulation experience. Explore the skies from the comfort of an ergonomically designed, feature-rich cockpit tailored for your preferred flying style.

description:
Introducing SimFab's DCS Edition Modular Combat Sim Cockpit

Elevate Your Sim Experience



At SimFab, we are dedicated to not only enhancing your immersion but also ensuring your comfort during extended simming sessions. Our patented design features a seat with a slanted, fully functional seat base cutout, allowing for motion-free use of your fighter stick, even with grip extensions.

This setup places your controls at the perfect arm’s reach, whether you’re using a standard grip or an extended stick as a helicopter cyclic.

The seat is generously padded with foam to guarantee the comfort you desire for those long missions.

Versatile Adaptability



While our DCS cockpit excels in the realm of DCS World simulation, it is not limited to it. Optional add-on plates and brackets are available to convert your setup into a civil/commercial aviation cockpit or a space sim ship.

For those who seek even greater versatility in the simulation world, we offer the option to easily convert it into a sim racing cockpit, with dedicated conversion kits readily available.

FAQs

What is in the package?

https://simfab.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/simfab-dcs-edition-modular-flight-pit-parts.webp

Essential Package Includes:


Flight seat with functional cutout for maximum comfort and maneuverability.
7″ seat risers providing 5 degrees seat slope for ergonomic seating position.
Seat frame for structural durability and stability.
Rudder pedal plate (type F) for precise yaw and taxi braking control over your aircraft. Refer to Configuration#4 (rudder pedal plate assembly as stand-alone product) for detailed controls compatibility.
Side-by-side stick (plates set type C) and throttle (plate type B) HOTAS-style mount brackets with adapter plates type B, throttle side and type C, stick side. Refer to configuration #2 (side by side kit as stand-alone product) for detailed controls compatibility.
Centered stick lower mount bracket with an extra set of stick plates (type C). Refer to configuration #6 (centered stick lower mount bracket as stand-alone product) for detailed controls compatibility.
All necessary controls mounting hardware, including a required wrench set.
Default adapter plates assume compatible controls as common choice for DCS edition cockpit, however exchange of plates is available at no additional cost. Refer to alternative plates for other brands/models sticks and throttles such as: plate type A, type D, type J.
